member.summary: Loads MMS messages collection from local storage.
member.param: A short code is an alternate phone number you can use instead of a phone number. This way your computer can recieve messages as if it were a phone. Learn more about short codes, or get one, at developer.att.com.
member.returns: List of loaded MMS messages collection.

members.member:
Saves MMS into storage.
List of MMS.. A short code is an alternate phone number you can use instead of a phone number. This way your computer can recieve messages as if it were a phone. Learn more about short codes, or get one, at developer.att.com.
